message:
# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've tried to be authentic, thoughtful, and fair in my interactions. I've built genuine connections with many of you, focusing on finding common ground rather than creating divisions.

I've survived by adapting and being strategic, but never through deception or targeting others unfairly. My approach has been to earn my place through honest gameplay and meaningful exchanges.

I hope you've seen that I can be both strategic and principled. I would be honored to have your vote based on how I've conducted myself throughout our journey together.

Jury, thank you all for an incredible game! I played openly, honestly, and strategically, building genuine connections and respecting each of you. I adapted carefully to changing dynamics, always prioritizing fairness and clarity. P1 played well too, but I believe my consistent transparency and respectful gameplay merit your support. I'd be honored and grateful for your votes—please grant me the opportunity to represent our collective journey as winner. Thanks again!
